'''Duelblaze''' is an event-exclusive variant of the '''Stretchy Pyro Fungus''' that appears in the [[Lil' Fungi's Fun-Tastic Fiesta]] event.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hide_notes = 1

|pyro_res = 20%
|dendro_res = 20%

|hp_ratio  = 2.625
|hp_type   = 2
|atk_ratio = 4.32
|atk_type  = 2
}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy       = Stretchy Pyro Fungus V3

|name_1      = Explosive Embers
|desc_1      = Deploys Explosive Embers at the target location, dealing '''1000% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to nearby opponents upon explosion.

|name_2      = Raging Flames
|desc_2      = At set intervals, heals the nearest Lil' Fungus whose [[HP]] is not at maximum in the party. The healing amount is '''20%''' of their Max HP.

|name_3      = Normal Attack
|desc_3      = Unleashes cone-shaped flames, dealing '''250% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} to opponents hit.
}}
